item.title: AO Archive: DIY Factories with Pytest
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2020/07/17/pytest-diy-factory-fixture/ This is a blog post I wrote while working at Atomic Object. It explains how to incorporate a Factory class into PyTest’s fixtures, in case you need to easily define scoped resources within specific tests.
